866320.name: Kabounce - Original Soundtrack
866320.description:
The Kabounce Original Soundtrack contains 14 electrifying, uniquely composed mixes with styles ranging between EDM, House and Instrumental influences. An additional bonus track includes the music composed exclusively for the launch trailer.

01. Arcade
02. Revel
03. Kick it
04. Machine
05. Dekkit
06. Harmony
07. Revel
08. Give it Up
09. Mizu
10. Surged
11. Your Shade
12. Tradition
13. Goldenstring
14. Final Game
15. (BONUS) Launch trailer track
866320.supported_languages: 英语, 法语, 意大利语, 德语, 西班牙语 - 西班牙, 阿拉伯语, 荷兰语, 日语, 韩语, 波兰语, 葡萄牙语 - 葡萄牙, 葡萄牙语 - 巴西, 俄语, 土耳其语
